tools.name: WinEvent-Finder
tools.description: A powerful interactive tool for searching and analyzing Windows Event IDs. Quickly find event codes, understand their meanings, and get security insights.

tools.name: Email Header Analyzer
tools.description: Parse and analyze email headers with geolocation lookups. Extract sender details, routing data, and IP addresses for forensics and security analysis.
